rows.label: tlk70000122_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Ack... After coming up with this new
Special, and me being a pro adventurer
and all...

rows.label: tlk70000122_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Oho! Just the band of adventurers
I was hoping to meet!

rows.label: tlk70000122_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Do you fancy performing the
Rose-in-Bloom with me now?

rows.label: tlk70000122_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Say what? You don't know the
Rose-in-Bloom?! Where have you been
living? It's a combo made of Specials!

rows.label: tlk70000122_03_msg0005
rows.name:
If you chain Specials together, these
things called element orbs will appear.
They're good to use, if you know how!

rows.label: tlk70000122_03_msg0006
rows.name:
But, even I'd get tired doing Special
moves one after the other, so I've been
looking for someone to help me out.

rows.label: tlk70000122_03_msg0007
rows.name:
You'd be a good fit...
But you might end up cramping
my style...

rows.label: tlk70000122_03_msg0008
rows.name:
Sorry, but maybe doing the
Rose-in-Bloom with you can
wait till another time.
